Class CategoryAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.ChartAxis
      • com.gembox.spreadsheet.charts.CategoryAxis

  • public final class CategoryAxis
extends ChartAxis
    Represents an axis used for categories.

      • getTickMarksInterval

        public int getTickMarksInterval()
        Gets the interval between tick marks that are drawn.

        Default value of this property is 1.

        Returns:
        The interval between tick marks that are drawn.

      • isAxisPositionOnTickMarks

        public boolean isAxisPositionOnTickMarks()
        Gets a value indicating whether the value axis shall cross the category axis at the midpoint of a category or between data markers.
        Returns:
        true if the value axis shall cross the category axis at the midpoint of a category; otherwise, false if the value axis shall cross the category axis between data markers.

      • setAxisPositionOnTickMarks

        public void setAxisPositionOnTickMarks(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether the value axis shall cross the category axis at the midpoint of a category or between data markers.
        Parameters:
        value - true if the value axis shall cross the category axis at the midpoint of a category; otherwise, false if the value axis shall cross the category axis between data markers.

      • setLabelsInterval

        public void setLabelsInterval(Optional<Integer> interval)
        Sets the interval between labels that are drawn.
        Parameters:
        interval - The interval between labels that are drawn.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Value must be between 1 and 255.

      • setTickMarksInterval

        public void setTickMarksInterval(int interval)
        Sets the interval between tick marks that are drawn.

        Default value of this property is 1.

        Parameters:
        interval - The interval between tick marks that are drawn.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - Value must be between 1 and 31999.
